mapper.insert: insert into students (id, name, address, age, sex, teacher) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teacher,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update students set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teacher = #{teacher,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, address, age, sex, teacher from students order by age desc,username asc
